languages.text: {n}Перед вами — древняя, но весьма типичная консоль, предназначенная для использования людьми, не обученными таинствам обращения с {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}машинными духами{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}Когитатор{/g} абсолютно безмолвен, однако, приблизившись, вы чувствуете исходящее от металлического корпуса тепло — верный признак того, что машина работает.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Перед вами — древняя, но весьма типичная консоль, предназначенная для использония людям, не обученным таинствам обращения с машинными духами. Когитатор абсолютно безмолвен, однако, приблизившись, вы чувствуете исходящее от металлического корпуса тепло — верный признак того, что машина работает.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Before you is an ancient, but wholly typical console, intended for use by people not trained in the mysteries of ministering to {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} is completely silent, but as you approach, you sense the warmth emanating from its metallic casing — a tell-tale sign that the machine is working.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Перед вами — древняя, но весьма типичная консоль, предназначенная для использования людьми, не обученными таинствам обращения с {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}машинными духами{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}Когитатор{/g} абсолютно безмолвен, однако, приблизившись, вы чувствуете исходящее от металлического корпуса тепло — верный признак того, что машина работает.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The cogitator is completely silent, but as you approach, you sense the warmth emanating from its metallic frame — a telltale sign that the machine is working.{/n}
{n}The cogitator is completely silent, but as you approach, you sense the warmth emanating from its metallic frame — a telltale sign that the machine is working.{/n}

{n}In front of you is an ancient, but very typical console, intended for use by people not trained in the mysterious nature of {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} is completely silent, but as you approach, you sense the warmth emanating from its metallic frame — a telltale sign that the machine is working.{/n}

The {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} is completely silent, but as you approach, you sense the warmth emanating from its metallic casing — a tell-tale sign that the machine is working.{/n}

languages.text: {n}在你面前摆着一个古老但非常典型的控制台，供那些完全没有接受过如何控制{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}机魂{/g}的人使用。这台{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}沉思者{/g}没有发出任何声音，但当你接近时，你感觉到它的金属框架传来了暖意。这表明这台机器正在工作。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Before you is an ancient, but wholly typical console, intended for use by people not trained in the mysteries of ministering to {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} is completely silent, but as you approach, you sense the warmth emanating from its metallic casing — a tell-tale sign that the machine is working.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}在你面前摆着一个古老但非常典型的控制台，供那些完全没有接受过如何控制{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}机魂{/g}的人使用。这台{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}思考器{/g}没有发出任何声音，但当你接近时，你感觉到它的金属框架传来了暖意。这表明这台机器正在工作。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ante ti hay una consola, antigua pero igualmente típica, cuyo uso está destinado a personas no familiarizadas con los misterios que entraña el atender a los {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}espíritus máquina{/g}. El {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitador{/g} guarda completo silencio, pero al acercarte sientes cómo emana calor de su armazón metálico; señal indudable de que la máquina está en funcionamiento.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Before you is an ancient, but wholly typical console, intended for use by people not trained in the mysteries of ministering to {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} is completely silent, but as you approach, you sense the warmth emanating from its metallic casing — a tell-tale sign that the machine is working.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ante ti hay una consola, antigua pero igualmente típica, cuyo uso está destinado a personas no familiarizadas con los misterios que entraña el atender a los {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}espíritus máquina{/g}. El {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitador{/g} guarda completo silencio, pero al acercarte sientes cómo emana calor de su armazón metálico; señal indudable de que la máquina está en funcionamiento.{/n}

languages.text: {n}目の前にあるのは、とても古いものではあるがよく見るタイプの機体で、謎の{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}機械精霊{/g}を扱う訓練を受けていない者が使う事を目的にしている。{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}考算機{/g}はシンとして音も聞こえないが、近づいてみると筐体から発する熱を感じる…機械が稼働している紛れもない証拠だ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Before you is an ancient, but wholly typical console, intended for use by people not trained in the mysteries of ministering to {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} is completely silent, but as you approach, you sense the warmth emanating from its metallic casing — a tell-tale sign that the machine is working.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}目の前にあるのは、とても古いものではあるがよく見るタイプの機体で、謎の{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}機械精霊{/g}を扱う訓練を受けていない者が使う事を目的にしている。{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}考算機{/g}はシンとして音も聞こえないが、近づいてみると筐体から発する熱を感じる…機械が稼働している紛れもない証拠だ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vor dir steht eine alte, aber völlig gewöhnliche Konsole für Personen, die nicht in die Geheimnisse des Umgangs mit {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}Maschinengeistern{/g} eingeweiht sind. Der {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}Cogitator{/g} verursacht nicht das geringste Geräusch, aber als du dich näherst, spürst du Wärme von seinem Metallgehäuse – ein klares Zeichen, dass die Maschine arbeitet.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Before you is an ancient, but wholly typical console, intended for use by people not trained in the mysteries of ministering to {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} is completely silent, but as you approach, you sense the warmth emanating from its metallic casing — a tell-tale sign that the machine is working.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vor dir steht eine alte, aber völlig gewöhnliche Konsole für Personen, die nicht in die Geheimnisse des Umgangs mit {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}Maschinengeistern{/g} eingeweiht sind. Der {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}Cogitator{/g} verursacht nicht das geringste Geräusch, aber als du dich näherst, spürst du Wärme von seinem Metallgehäuse – ein klares Zeichen, dass die Maschine arbeitet.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous avez devant vous une console antique, mais classique dans son fonctionnement, conçue pour être utilisée par ceux qui n'ont pas été formés aux arcanes mystérieux des {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}esprits de la machine{/g}. Le {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitateur{/g} est totalement silencieux, mais vous sentez la chaleur qui se dégage de sa structure métallique à mesure que vous approchez... signe indéniable que la machine fonctionne.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Before you is an ancient, but wholly typical console, intended for use by people not trained in the mysteries of ministering to {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} is completely silent, but as you approach, you sense the warmth emanating from its metallic casing — a tell-tale sign that the machine is working.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous avez devant vous une console antique, mais classique dans son fonctionnement, conçue pour être utilisée par ceux qui n'ont pas été formés aux arcanes mystérieux des {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}esprits de la machine{/g}. Le {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitateur{/g} est totalement silencieux, mais vous sentez la chaleur qui se dégage de sa structure métallique à mesure que vous approchez... signe indéniable que la machine fonctionne.{/n}

languages.text: Önünde, {n}{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}makine ruhlarına{/g} hizmet etmenin gizemleri konusunda eğitim almamış kimselerin kullanması için tasarlanmış, kadim ama gayet normal bir konsol var. {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}Kavramsayardan{/g} ses çıkmasa da yaklaşınca metalik kasasından yayılan sıcaklığı hissedebiliyorsun. Belli ki makine çalışıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Before you is an ancient, but wholly typical console, intended for use by people not trained in the mysteries of ministering to {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} is completely silent, but as you approach, you sense the warmth emanating from its metallic casing — a tell-tale sign that the machine is working.{/n}

traits.locale_text: Önünde, {n}{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}makine ruhları{/g}na hizmet etmenin gizemleri konusunda eğitim almamış kimselerin kullanması için tasarlanmış, kadim ama gayet normal bir konsol var. {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}Kavramsayar{/g}dan ses çıkmasa da yaklaşınca metalik kasasından yayılan sıcaklığı hissedebiliyorsun. Belli ki makine çalışıyor.{/n}
